data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.

In the minute 2, Free kick CSKA Moscow.
Can CSKA Moscow capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in for CSKA Moscow at VEB Arena.

Kirill Levnikov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Nikola Vlasic (CSKA Moscow) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to CSKA Moscow.
Can CSKA Moscow get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half?

Ilia Shkurin is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
